pkgmetadata.longdescription: django-adminlte-ui==================django admin theme base on adminlteadminlte version: 2.4.18install=======:: pip install django-adminlte-uisetup=====:: INSTALLED_APPS = [ 'adminlteui', 'django.contrib.admin', 'django.contrib.auth', 'django.contrib.sites', 'django.contrib.sitemaps', 'django.contrib.contenttypes', 'django.contrib.sessions', 'django.contrib.messages', 'django.contrib.staticfiles', # custom menu base on treebeard 'treebeard', ... ]Init models===========:: python manage.py migrate django_admin_settings
